divs: Sighting DetailsI just pulled into my drive way when I noticed several bright lights in the sky, about 10 or 12. I stood there and observed them for about a half hour. While I watched these lights I saw one among the trees moving south "I was looking to the east." I keep looking around and right above me there was a large dark object with four lights in the shape of a diamond, the lights were faint, but noticable. The lights were slowly moving north at a steady pace. The clouds were starting to move in about this time. Most of the lights by now were covered by the clouds. I could only see the one light in the tree line, it started pulsing a clear light then the light pattern instantly changed to a multi color strobing pattern. The light moved fairly quickly upward into the clouds and disappeared. That was the last that I saw of the lights.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Monroe
There were no other sightings in Monroe on or around January 4th 2007
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Moving Lights in the sky, looked like really bright flashing stars
